title.rendered: Roomi vs Diggz: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder

content.rendered:
When it comes to any significant changes in our lives, we want to make sure that we make the right decision. And the same goes with choosing a roommate! There are many websites and apps that you can use, but you’re probably wondering, what’s the best website to find roommates? Don’t fret! If you’re moving to the big city and you want to cut the cost by living with another person, read on! We’ll give you the rundown on Roomi, a detailed Diggz review, and tips to help you find the most appropriate roommate.

Pricing: Are roommate finder apps free or paid?

One thing you should remember about Roomi is that it’s free. You can download the app free of charge and use its convenient roommate finding services. But with a Roomi Gold subscription (which can be a weekly or monthly plan), you have access to unlimited messages and unlimited swipes, your status can be upgraded to Fully Verified (meaning you’ll get more messages), your ranking will be boosted so more users get to see it, and there’s no booking fee. With $29.99 per month or $14.99 per week, you get all these features and more!

With Diggz, the services are free as well. However, you only get five Instant Messages, and you have to pay if you want more. Diggz also offers a subscription service called Diggz Premium that costs $23.99 per month, and weekly packages starting at $14.99. With a subscription, you get only 10 Instant Messages per day, a boost on your profile, access to extra search filters, and unlimited likes.

Security: Can these apps help me find roommates I can trust?

Moving to a big city like New York can be scary, so finding roommates who you feel safe and comfortable with is key! Besides that, it’s vital that the roommate finder apps and websites you use have verified listings to ensure your safety. And Roomi has got all of that! As an alternative to Diggz, Roomi has many safety features to ensure your privacy and help you find a safe roomie.

Verifies Roommate Contact Info

To create an account in Diggz, you can sign up using your Facebook, Google, or Apple accounts or simply use your email. However, not all profiles have a ‘Verified’ badge on them. As an alternative to Diggz, Roomi uses GlobalID. It’s a digital identity platform that verifies users and their contact information while keeping it safe and secure.

ID Verification

Roomi has specific profile photo requirements, which helps verify user profiles and prevent scams. And with Roomi Gold, you can get your own Fully Verified status and see others who have the same status as well! Don’t sweat though, even without a subscription, Roomi has various levels of verification available for everyone.

Diggz offers verification through the accounts that the users connect their Diggz account to. Some users have a ‘Verified’ badge on their profile with the Facebook logo beside it, but not all users have it.

Privacy & security of profiles

We all worry about apps having too much information about us, like our address or contact number, when we’re just finding a room to rent or a roommate. Especially now, where almost everyone has access to the internet, it’s a valid fear! However, with Roomi, you don’t have to worry.

Roomi has secure in-app messaging to keep your messages safe. If you need to communicate with a potential roommate about your address, contact information, and more, the alternative to Diggz ensures that your private information is kept safe within the app. And with the General Data Protection Regulation, you can have your data deleted after filling out the form. Roomi can also delete your profile for you’ve found a roommate — all you have to do is send them an email or contact their customer support.

Meanwhile, Diggz assures its users that they use their own artificial intelligence technology to ensure their users’ privacy.

24/7 Support & Content Moderation

Roomi has its own in-house content moderation team to filter out bad listings and to make sure that the content is real and void of spam. And with the thorough verification process of Roomi, on both users and listings, searching for roommates is reliable and safe on the platform. At the same time, Diggz uses artificial intelligence to keep the app in check.

Criminal Background Check

On Roomi, an alternative to Diggz, you can submit your own profile for a background check, and once completed, you get an ID verified badge on your profile, which will make finding the perfect match for you much easier!

User Profiles: Which App Makes It Easier to Find Your Perfect Roommate?

One thing that makes Roomi the best website to find roommates is the easy app and website navigation. Both platforms are super user-friendly and make your roommate-finding experience hassle-free. More than that, Roomi has an excellent roommate matching algorithm with filters based on preferences that you can set to choose the best roommate for you. Like, if you prefer to live with LGBTQ+ or a senior for a roommate, Roomi can make that happen; just make sure to select the appropriate filter!

Both apps also have the option to filter when searching, but in Diggz, the filters you can apply are limited to gender, age, budget, and city. Roomi, as an alternative to Diggz, has more options like which specific neighborhood in the city, preferences, and when the user was last active, making everything easier for you.

Can you find non-binary roommates?

Of course! Roomi has very specific filtering to help you narrow down your search for the most appropriate roommate for you. There’s also the “No Preference” option available, as well as the “male,” “female,” and “non-binary” options.

Find Roommates

So, which is the best Roommate Finder for you?

Finding the perfect roommate is essential to make your stay in a new city worthwhile and enjoyable. And there are so many aspects to consider when finding a place to live and a roommate to share with, like security and privacy, convenience, and pricing. Luckily, Roomi is an all-around app where you can find rooms and roommates, free of charge, with particular attention to keeping your private information secure. Talk about the best roommate finder, huh? Download the app and sign up today!

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
